review: VERY Simple to operate (plug and play! with addition of network password and various service accounts). I have many media players and this is probably the simplest yet. I have to admit, my wifi router sits next to my TV so I haven't had any connectivity problems, but if you've got a strong signal, I'm not sure how much clearer or simpler it can get. Also, I love the android app that allows me to search by voice.
